resources.string: Error, date and time must be entered!
Error, invalid date and time format.

Error, task cannot be updated. That\'s probably because You\'re trying to add task with exactly the same date and time as for the one of the previously added tasks, causing conflicts. Please, change at least a minute.

Error, task cannot be saved. That\'s probably because You\'re trying to add task with exactly the same date and time as for the one of the previously added tasks, causing conflicts. Please, change at least a minute.
